text: It was decided that custom roles will be implemented to provide greater flexibility and granularity in access control.
Furthermore, the meeting addressed and clarified the rules governing inheritance for these roles, ensuring a clear understanding of how permissions will be propagated throughout the system.
This task is assigned to @alice, who will be responsible for outlining the structure and relationships between the different custom roles.
This responsibility lies with @bob, who will translate the clarified inheritance model into functional code within the authentication system.
This review will involve relevant stakeholders to ensure the implemented custom roles and inheritance rules adhere to the organization's broader security and compliance requirements.
